content.text:
# Filmfare Award for Best Critics film - Malayalam

The Filmfare Award for Best Critics Film - Malayalam  is given by the Filmfare Magazine as part of its annual Filmfare Awards South for South Indian films. It acknowledges an encourages the filmmakers of a direction department. In 2022, Critics Award for Best film Malayalam has started.
